#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
 {
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);

   while(t--)
    {
      int n,sum=0;
      scanf("%d",&n);

      cout<<(4*n*(4*n-1)*(4*n-2)/6) - 4*(n*(n-1)*(n-2))/6;
      cout<<endl; // total number of ways in which 3 points can be selected is 4nc3.So,the possible number of traingles that can be formed, would be this,minus the points which lie on one side(collinear points,which is nc3*4(as there are 4 sides.).
    }


 return 0;
 }
